text:
Apple is reportedly working on a major 20th anniversary redesign for the iPhone 19 Pro alongside a foldable iPhone 

The new design will make a 'more extensive use of glass'

Source: @markgurman

Full story: https://bloomberg.com/news/newsletters/2025-04-06/will-apple-raise-iphone-prices-in-the-us-after-trump-tariffs-iphone-17-details?cmpid=BBD040625_POWERON&utm_medium=email&utm_source=newsletter&utm_term=250406&utm_campaign=poweron…
People are really way past this design!

Every year we see these "Bold" reports about a New and A exciting iPhone, often a year before it's released.

When the device is actually released however it tends to disappoint and show that most of the rumors were false.
$4000 after Trump’s tariffs
Just got an iPhone 16 Pro Max last year, so I will probably hold out for this anniversary redesign!
iPhone 19 Pro  iPhone X
Apple is reportedly working on a major 40th anniversary redesign for the iPhone XXX Pro alongside a foldable iPhone.

iPhone X2

Phew, no two-toned iPhone 17 Pro/Pro Max.

So finally most of the ridiculous looking "demo, render, and pulled out of the sky units" can all just stop. 

Now onto the major overhaul of iOS...

Apple just launched a new brand: Apple Ads. Could Apple be preparing to launch a full ads business again at WWDC?

Apple plans to launch an in-store recycling promotion tomorrow, giving a 10% discount (up to $20 off) on Apple accessories — including AirPods, AirTags, Apple Pencil, watch bands, cases, Mac peripherals — when bringing in items not eligible for trade-in credit. Runs for a month.
